Context:
The Tutoring and Learning Centre (TLC) at George Brown College is open for in-person and online tutoring. Here's how to log in with your GBC credentials:

1. Go to the TLC website: <https://www.georgebrown.ca/student-services/tutoring-learning-centre/>
2. Click on "Log In" at the top right corner of the page.
3. Enter your George Brown College username (your student number) and password.
4. Once logged in, you can book a tutoring session or access online resources.

The TLC offers various services such as academic tutoring, writing support, math help, and language assistance. The centre is open for students from all programs and campuses.

If you have any questions, please contact the TLC at ask.george@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). Stay updated with George Brown College news and events by signing up for their mailing list.

The college's land acknowledgement can be found on the website: <https://www.georgebrown.ca/about/land-acknowledgment/>

Please note that the information provided is factual, including contact details and services offered by the TLC. For any updates or changes to programs or fees, it's essential to visit the official George Brown College website or contact them directly.
